website_summaries.verdict: One of the best wetsuit jackets women can buy with its comfortable fit and durable materials.
pros: High collar keeps more water out of jacket than other comparable models
Sizing is true to fit and flattering
cons: Tends to ride up when in the water, which can fill jacket with air pockets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove. Keeps me warm in the pool. Great for winter pool exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Topper!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing a 3mm wetsuit for snorkeling/lobstering in the Florida Keys in January and February, but sometimes get cold with prolonged exposure. I borrowed one of these jackets from a friend to wear over my wetsuit and it makes all the difference! The sleeves fit snugly, which helps to keep me warm. I imagine that you could wear this alone in warmer water conditions. These jackets run very small. Based on the borrowed jacket I bought a size 12, which is quite snug. For reference, I normally wear a size 8 (small) 34D bra, so you might want to size up.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Wildflower

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and worth the extra cost. As a plus-size woman I found it difficult to find the right fit. I ordered men's, but they were too big. Finally I found this and it was a women's and true to size. I will use this for water aerobics in the winter, as the pool is outside at our fitness center. I look forward to seeing how the cinch works, as it is snug already around the hips as it should be. I hope it really doesn't work itself up when I exercise.
customer_reviews.author: taffyw

customer_reviews.title: Good for water aerobics during the winter!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this jacket so I could swim in an outside heated pool during the winter. I tried it out when we had a cold, windy day and it worked exactly as I had hoped. The arms are a little wide, but that's perfect for exercising. The core fits well, allowing for different body types, and the zipper is easy to work. I lost a dress size this summer walking in the pool for 60-90 minutes a day. I didn't want to lose the momentum this winter and this jacket will help me do just that! I don't know what your needs are, but this jacket is easy to wash and it does dry quickly.
customer_reviews.author: LVSunny

customer_reviews.title: rides up, fills with water and stretched out in a week. returned.
customer_reviews.text: This fit me nice and tight like a neoprene wetsuit should fit, but it stretched out in one week. Even with the tightening string at the bottom it rides up my body in the water and needs to be pulled down. I thought the no collar would be good, but because it rides up and fills with water, the neckline ends up choking you.
customer_reviews.author: opinionated consumer

customer_reviews.title: No longer an Orca...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical due to the fact that this order was "Used," however, I am very happy with my purchase! It fits like a glove and doesn't seem to retain water like the previous larger size. I no longer feel like an Orca...just a shark swimming my laps in the pool! I have RA and need the extra clothing/protection in a cool pool. This jacket has great stretch for swimming and is very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny F.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing not great
customer_reviews.text: It's great but I wish it was available in a short as the company advertises. I'm 5' 2", the sleeves and body are too long. In the water the bottom rolls up. The sleeves are also large - too wide . I do use it and like the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wore for the first time.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is heavier than I thought it would be and kept me warm. It was very snug when first on, but grew stretchier in the water and rode up during exercise class, even the arms became baggy. It has a drawstring which did not help keep it from riding up. I will keep it because it kept my upper body warm in the pool, but you may need to order a smaller size - skin tight on shore, good fit in water.
customer_reviews.author: Sally g

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and the sleeves allow flexible movement
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and the sleeves allow flexible movement. My spring wet suit is a size 6 so I purchased a size 6. Once in the water, it was obvious I am between a size 4 and size 6 in this model.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent arm movement for swimming
customer_reviews.text: Excellent arm movement for swimming, keeps body warm, sizing as per regular size, easy to put on and take off. Problems: Slips up while swiiming, especially during flip turns and I could feel the zipper in my chin. Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette M Montilla

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wetsuit jacket!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find wetsuit attire in plus sizes and most are shapeless and lack color and style but this wetsuit jacket is the exception! It is flattering and attractive on someone who is not built like a barbie doll! :) Size was true, very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bluetn

customer_reviews.title: True to size and keeps me warmer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I could go into the pool when it was cooler than I would otherwise go in with just a swimsuit. It works for that purpose, although my legs still get cold which is the first thing that gets into the pool. Fairly easy, for a wetsuit, to get on and off. Fits true to the size listed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my water aerobics class
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my water aerobics class. What was really amazing is that the sizing chart is so accurate. If you take the measurements and buy the size they tell you to buy -- it fits! That is rare. This is easy to get on and off when wet or dry, fits perfectly, and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Odile F.

customer_reviews.title: This really helps me keep warm while swimming in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This really helps me keep warm while swimming in the local health club pool and it doesn't float up in the water. Addendum : This stretched out very quickly in the pool and got so large it was almost to my ankles and I had to discard it. If you decide to try it be sure to use Woolite to wash it as that may help to prevent the stretching out of the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: nancya

customer_reviews.title: The arms are a little snug on me but overall it is a great fit and I really like the color combination
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this jacket for water aerobics class. It is really well made and fits well. The fabric is very stretchy and soft too. The arms are a little snug on me but overall it is a great fit and I really like the color combination. I usually wear a size 16 but ordered the 14 after seeing the sizing chart and it's fine so I would say that it runs large.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne S

customer_reviews.title: IF it had been made in the USA it would have gotten 5+stars!
customer_reviews.text: I'd ordered 1 size 18 and one size 16. I got 2 size 18's and I am returning the 2nd size 18 and waiting for a size 16. I have a lined bathing suit and an unlined one so I need 2 different sizes. I have worn it and it makes a VERY SIGNIFICANT difference in the pool! IF it had been made in the USA it would have gotten 5+stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love it. fits great
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love it. fits great, and could no find any imperfections anywhere even tho it was sold as a used or slightly imperfected. Therefore saved about $50 buying a used o slightly imperfected model
customer_reviews.author: mary vodisek

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket! Works well in my aquarobics class. When I get too warm, I just unzip and off it comes! No trying to get it over my head.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: but it does a great job of keeping you warm in the pool if ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm plus size and cannot have everything. Fits snug in the trunk, but the arms are not snug. wish they were. but it does a great job of keeping you warm in the pool if you have fibro and are walking instead of swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cool weather water shirt. The weight is great for water aerobics to keep the chill off. I've used it with temps in the 50s with no problem. The zip front makes it easy to put on and remove and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene M Wood

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This runs super small! I'm a small busted size 8 and had to get a size 12! Trust me, I had to order this three times to get the correct fit. It is a great piece and I use it for snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fits great.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Bought XS, my measurements are 96lb, 5'3" tall, 32-25-33
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: this was a quality jacket - lightweight neoprene - well made. Unfortunately, my mistake, I ordered it in a size too large and needed to return it. I would not hesitate to buy it in a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: I'm very glad I got this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I intially ordered the wrong size. I contacted the the original vendor and they were very helpful in getting me into the proper fit. I water walk among other water exercise in a heated outdoor pool. The jacket keeps my upper body warm when I walk. I'm very glad I got this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth L. Lowman

customer_reviews.title: Such a waste of money and such a huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is correct, but it rides up in the water. Then the chest fills up with water and balloons. Impossible to swim with it on. I spend a lot of time pulling it down only to have it ride up again. Such a waste of money and such a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Broom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. True to size. Very comfortable and the full length zipper is outstanding --- it works perfectly and was especially useful when removing a heavy, wet jacket. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Mother

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Did not last more than a week in the water. The sleeves and sides are made with a very thin material, not even a week and already falling apart. Bad quality product. Highly do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ann C.

customer_reviews.title: I should have ordered a short wet suit as this ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered a short wet suit as this rides up in the water... the people at this manufacturer were very helpful trying to give me suggestions to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Gordon-Burke

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is comfy and warm and great looking! Arrived promptly. It is true to size. I wear a W 12 and this was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Loved the jacket but it runs really small
customer_reviews.text: Loved the jacket but it runs really small. They increased the price quite a bit so I didn't reorder a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine L.

customer_reviews.title: Functional. The nature of the jacket means it slides ...
customer_reviews.text: Functional. The nature of the jacket means it slides up in the back as I am swimming, which is somewhat uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: B Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for tropical diving when all you really need is a little core warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Mary  White

customer_reviews.title: Item runs small
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket, but it was too tight. I need a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and if you do a lot of board ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and if you do a lot of board kicking in the pool in the winter this is a nice jacket to hsve
customer_reviews.author: Davis girl

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's good
customer_reviews.text: Sleeves are a little longer than expected, but they can be hemmed. Overall it's good
customer_reviews.author: fitzpatty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for swimming and water exercise. I am Plus size and it fit perfectly. It is more comfortable than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea E. Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Oh, what a relief it is.
customer_reviews.text: Now I feel warm while doing my water aroebics. I found by hanging it in my bathroom, it dries by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Stay warm with XCel women's long sleeve Aqua Fitness
customer_reviews.text: Fits snuggly and meets my criteria to remain warm during water aerobics.
customer_reviews.author: Fayette

customer_reviews.title: great buy... Fits true to size
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I am usually an 18 but I ordered a 18 and 20. The 18 fits PERFECTLY! So sizes are true to size. I returned the 20 with no difficulty. Highly recommended.....
customer_reviews.author: elisa  king

customer_reviews.title: does its job
customer_reviews.text: zip up front, easy to put on, fits over suite, can move in it, keeps me warm in cool water
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Love this Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket but I believe it is too small for me... had to pay extra duty at the door, but I guess that was expected but I was not thinking that.... But as far as the jacket is concerned is a beautiful wetsuit Jacket. I would definitely order from this company again and again. It took a long time to get here but customs held it up at their end not anything due to the company itself,.
customer_reviews.author: Holly L McLean

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This wet suit jacket is of high quality fabric; extremely well made. I am between size and 12 and 14 but found the 12 too tight, even allowing for expanding once wet. Definitely worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Cozy Fan

customer_reviews.title: The jacket seems really nice but it runs big
customer_reviews.text: The jacket seems really nice but it runs big. I had to return the one I purchased and get a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: BuyStuff

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfectly and I don't mind the cold mornings ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly and I don't mind the cold mornings anymore at the pool. it was a little more than I wanted to spend but well worth the price to get me to the pool to excercize.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hess

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to get into the water comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: MSS

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect, no more shivering
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my water aerobics teacher, she was always cold. It is perfect, no more shivering.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bengelsdorf

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice to zipper in front. Easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Beatie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for winter swimming in Phoenix area. Much easier to get and out of than a shorty wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Nikel

customer_reviews.title: It was really nice but I bought the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: It was really nice but I bought the wrong size. I should have gotten her a smaller size. She still wears it and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Legere

customer_reviews.title: I am quite pleased, although there are some flaws
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased, although there are some flaws, like cold water seeping in, but one the whole I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Really high quality! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought this! Didn't want to take full wetsuit on vacation for snorkeling so took a chance on this, having never tried one on before. I'm a small person 5'2" 105lbs usually wear a 2/4 in clothing. Ordered a 6. The forearms did feel a little tight when I tried it dry. I will probably order an 8 to try but didn't have time then. I packed it and thought I'd give it to my daughter if it was tight. I put it on for snorkeling in San Juan and never really thought about it being tight. Was so glad I had it!!! It feels so well made and doesn't restrict my movement. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cy

customer_reviews.title: Great for water aerobics
customer_reviews.text: Love this as our pool is cold & it keeps me warmed up when exercising in water aerobics. Only complaint is too loose in the hips & rides up on my swimming suit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Gerdenich

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: I followed the sizing chart and found it was too large. Could have gone down a size. Would have been more effective. Quite expensive also.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa E Palumbo

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered too large size but it does not fit like a wetsuit to me
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I ordered too large size but it does not fit like a wetsuit to me. I like the fabric and zipper, it is just the fit I am not happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: I needed an aqua shirt and this is thicker--more for ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed an aqua shirt and this is thicker--more for diving in the ocean. I needed something for aqua aerobics in an indoor pool. I sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Karen Eddy

customer_reviews.title: It was comfortable. Great fit
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well. I only wish the neck was a little higher. It was comfortable. Great fit. Easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: MJCSeattle

product_meta.title: XCEL 2mm/1mm Makaha Smoothskin Front Zip Long Sleeve Top, Black, Size 12
product_meta.description: A full front zipper makes this popular wetsuit top a breeze to get on and off. SmoothSkin front and back body and upper sleeves for excel- lent wind resistance and improved core warmth; 1mm neoprene under sleeves and side panels. Premium 100% UltraStretch neoprene; comfortable flatlock seams.
feature_bullets: Should fit snug, but not too tight
